p: Then we analyzed the cytokine profile through the wound healing process. EPA reduced the concentrations of IL-1β and increased TNF-α 1 day after skin wounding (Fig. 3D). On the other hand, EPA increased IL-10 concentrations at the 3 rd day until the 7 th after wounding. There was also an increase in IL-6 concentrations at this time point in scar tissue (Fig. 3D). We observed no alterations in MMP9 concentrations at the times analyzed. However, supplementation with EPA-rich oil decreased TIMP-1 levels on the 1 st and 3 rd days after lesion (Fig. 3D).
